```{r}
# read in data

## for plotting:
rgn_colors <- c(
  "Region_1" = "#C03729",
  "Region_2" = "#E68C7C",
  "Region_3" = "#FC8F24",
  "Region_4" = "#dcaa38",
  "Region_5" = "#cbd2a0",
  "Region_6" = "#98a25a",
  "Region_7" = "#747428",

  "Region_9" = "#8d61a9"
)
```

```{r, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 10}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false


mapview(ohi_nolines_git, zcol = "rgn_id",layer.name = "GoC OHI regions", col.regions = rgn_colors)
```
